name: Kella Ser Dress Up
description:
Dress up the Kella Ser friend in cute clothes!

A number of clothing options are currently available and more may be added in the future! If you have a type of clothing you would like to see, please let us know in the comments!

My website is Jackalune.com and you can follow me on Twitter and Twitch!

This game was made in Construct 2 .

Kella Sers are a species of companion from Aestralis, a currently under development browser-based game.

Inspired by other super cute dress up games that you can find online! Here are a couple I really like!
https://nomnomnami.itch.io/dress-treat
https://www.deviantart.com/art/Fox-Creator-1-2-491912551
